item.title: Small Business Stabilization Fund has Reopened until 11/30
item.description:
Do you have a small business in Seattle? Has your business been impacted by COVID-19?

The Small Business Stabilization Fund has reopened! The Small Business Stabilization Fund provides $10,000 grants to small businesses throughout Seattle who have been financially impacted by COVID-19. This fund prioritizes businesses located in areas â€¦
item.dc:creator: amandacrosley
